dict.string: Change current Chome tab from amazon.com to amazon.co.uk
Change a URL to the Amazon.co.uk shop

--# pbpaste | sed -E 's/(.*amazon\.)(com)(.*)/\1co\.uk\3/' | pbcopy | pbpaste
tell application "System Events" set myFrontMost to name of first item of (processes whose frontmost is true) end tell
log myFrontMost
property theURL : ""
if myFrontMost is "Google Chrome" then tell application "Google Chrome" set theURL to URL of active tab of window 1 end tell
log theURL
set findList to "(.*amazon\\.)(com)(.*)" set replaceList to "\\1co\\.uk\\3" set sedCmd to "echo " & theURL & " | sed -E 's/" & findList & "/" & replaceList & "/'" log sedCmd set newURL to do shell script sedCmd
log newURL
tell application "Google Chrome" activate set URL of active tab of window 1 to newURL end tell
end if
